casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Rashawn D. YARRELL. No. 448P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 30, 2005. Daniel Shatz, for Rashawn D. Yarrell. Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th day of August 2005 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of August 2005."
